Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.htl.geometrics.Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a point with x and y coordinate
    Author:
    Jakob Ecker, Dominik Simon

      • checkOneIntersectionPoint

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Point> checkOneIntersectionPoint(java.util.ArrayList<Point> points)
        Deprecated. 
        Checks a list of points for redundant points. If there is a point that is more than 2 times in the list only this point is returned, else a new list without redundancy is returned.
        Parameters:
        points -
        Returns:
